title: Fix white/blank screen in hero section around KARM + FaultyTerminal background

requirements.text: Investigate and fix the white/blank screen appearing in the main hero section where the "KARM" wordmark is displayed over the FaultyTerminal background, so the hero consistently renders with a dark background and the intended terminal effect across supported browsers/devices.

quotes: bro why there is white screen at main section where karm is written with faulty terminal

acceptanceCriteria: On page load, the hero section does not show a solid white block/flash in the area behind/around the "KARM" wordmark.
The FaultyTerminal background renders correctly (animated terminal effect) on browsers/devices with WebGL support.
No new console errors are emitted during normal hero rendering (excluding existing unrelated warnings).

requirements.text: Add a graceful fallback for the FaultyTerminal component when WebGL context creation, shader compilation, or program linking fails, ensuring the hero section still displays a dark, visually coherent background instead of a white/blank screen.

quotes: white screen at main section where karm is written with faulty terminal

acceptanceCriteria: If WebGL is unavailable or shader/program setup fails, the hero section shows a non-white fallback background (e.g., solid black or subtle dark gradient) and the rest of the hero content remains readable.
The FaultyTerminal component cleans up event listeners/animation frames without throwing errors when unmounted, regardless of whether it initialized WebGL successfully.

constraints: Do not edit frontend immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui (compose instead).
Keep all changes within the existing React + TypeScript + Tailwind setup; no new backend services or external dependencies that violate platform constraints.
nonGoals: No changes to backend install counter logic or persistence.
No redesign of landing page content/sections beyond what is needed to eliminate the white/blank screen and provide a fallback for the FaultyTerminal effect.
